item.title: Claude Code Tips & Tricks: Custom Slash Commands
item.description:
The Power of Custom Slash Commands #

I’ve been using Claude Code to help manage this website, and I kept finding myself typing similar instructions repeatedly: “Create a new draft post titled <X>,” “Check this file for spelling, grammar, and UK English,” “Clear the cache and start the server” in a very wordy way with a lot of back and forth â€” these repetitive tasks were begging to be streamlined.
